name: Gail L. ULRICH, Appellant, v. Richard I. HEATH, Appellee

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER and BALDWIN, JJ.
Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Gail L. ULRICH, Appellant, v. Richard I. HEATH, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Court being evenly divided, the Order of the Superior Court is affirmed.
Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Ronald McGlaughlin, Esq., Stover, McGlaughlin, Gerace, Weyandt & McCormick, P.C., State College, for Gail L. Ulrich.
Peter McManamon, Esq., Henry & Corcelius, Huntingdon, for Richard I. Heath.
casebody.head_matter:
912 A.2d 201
Gail L. ULRICH, Appellant, v. Richard I. HEATH, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 4, 2006.
Decided Dec. 21, 2006.
Ronald McGlaughlin, Esq., Stover, McGlaughlin, Gerace, Weyandt & McCormick, P.C., State College, for Gail L. Ulrich.
Peter McManamon, Esq., Henry & Corcelius, Huntingdon, for Richard I. Heath.
BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER and BALDWIN, JJ.
